question: [File: aptos-core/storage/storage-interface/src/state_store/state.rs] [Function: version()] [Integer underflow] Can an attacker trigger a panic or undefined behavior when calling version() on a State with next_version = 0 (pre-genesis state), causing checked_sub(1) to return None and potentially crash validator nodes during state queries?
